name: Gum-Gum Dawn Whip
effect: [Main] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 4000 power or less cannot activate [Blocker] during this turn.
trigger: [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 4000 power or less.
